Articles.Content: I really miss the Monday Dev streams... Any chance of there being one today?
Most likely zero chance. They are changing their format and won't likely follow the old system at all anymore
I heard that there will be one on the last stream.
I really do hope for one! it's been almost a month since the last one. (Time sure does fly)

I heard that there will be one on the last stream.

On the last stream of what? The last KSPTV stream was a month ago, and, you know, there's been some changes since then. So no, there won't be any streams in near future.

Well, I do remember reading that Skunky said he was cleared to start steaming again... So maybe just maybe we could expect something today. So he could inform us of the new stream schedules if there are any, and just some info on what's been happening the past couple weeks.

On the last stream of what? The last KSPTV stream was a month ago, and, you know, there's been some changes since then. So no, there won't be any streams in near future.
One of the moderators, i think it was Kasper, said that on the chat last friday.
I hope they do, I'm curious as to how things are progressing.
At least they could post some pics

I'm curious to know how open Squad will be to us now, with their whole restructuring thing. While I'd love to see more livestreams, it wouldn't surprise me if they did a lot less. I think Harv mentioned doing more in the way of blog updates, which would be nice to see!

I hope things get back to normal around here though.

There is no official stream schedule or even just a notice thread, there is no twitch link above on the forums. And with everything that has happened for the last weeks, I thought it should be clear to everyone that it's pointless to ask about it and coming to check in on twitch. Just forget about it.
It still never hurts to ask though Because eventually they will start again.
